BLL

Class MediaElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • BLL.MediaItem
        • BLL.MediaElement

  • public class MediaElement
extends MediaItem
    Parent node in the BLL tree structure of project content

      • setStatus

        public boolean setStatus(MediaStatus status,
                Worker updatingUser,
                java.lang.String description,
                WorkerRoles roleType,
                Worker allocatedTo,
                int priority)
        Use to update the status and create a new task if required
        Specified by:
        setStatus in class MediaItem
        Parameters:
        status - the new status - this is validated against the WorkFlow object (valid options can be obtained from getValidStatusOptions(Worker worker))
        updatingUser - the Worker object of the user wishing to make the change - not all users can carry out all operations
        description - the description to be including in the new task associated with this new status
        roleType - the worker role types that are required to carry out the operations of the new task
        allocatedTo - a specific worker if this task is allocated to them
        priority - the priority of the new task
        Returns:
        confirmation if the status change has happened

      • setMediaSource

        public boolean setMediaSource(MediaSource mediaSource)
        Set the source of the media e.g. client, contractor, etc. Can only be set before any task to create media are created
